name: Ashraf Aboulnaga
content: Ashraf Aboulnaga Ashraf Aboulnaga Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering University of Texas at Arlington [Research] [Students] [Publications] [Teaching] [Scientific Activities] Office: Engineering Research Building (Room 622B), 500 UTA Blvd., Arlington, TX Phone: +1 (817) 272-3716 E-mail: firstname.lastname@uta.edu Mailing Address: For postal mail and package deliveries Short bio / Detailed CV Research I am a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the University of Texas at Arlington. Prior to joining UTA, I was the Chief Scientist of the Qatar Computing Research Institute (QCRI), an Associate Professor at the University of Waterloo, and a Research Staff Member at the IBM Almaden Research Center. My research is in the area of databases, with a current focus on the following topics: Machine learning on graph data. Data infrastructure for AI. Cloud-native database systems. Large-scale graph analytics.
